Fire. Jim began cooking fried chicken on the stove. As the chicken sizzled, he remembered he forgot something in the car. Jim left the kitchen to get the sauce he left in the car. While he was outside the oil spilled over and started a fire. Jim called 911 and the fire department came to put out the fire.

New Phone. Lisa got a new cell phone for her birthday. She spent hours playing with all of its new features. And she installed several apps. Everyday, she spent hours texting her friends. And her parents regret her buying a new phone.

Animal Instinct. Tom took his girlfriend to the zoo. She had never been to any kind of wildlife preserve. Tom felt proud as he showed her the beautiful animals. Then they saw two zebras in an open field mating in front of everyone! Tom never took a girl to a zoo again.

The Celery. Kelsey wanted to lose weight. She decided to only eat celery. The ate it for breakfast and lunch. By dinner time, she was starving and very grouchy. She gorged herself on pizza that evening and gained five pounds.

Bishop. We would always pester Bishop about his first name. Even if we bribed him, he refused to tell us what it actually was. He invited me to breakfast this morning and I finally learned it. Bishop was standing there with his girlfriend and he introduced us. She turned to him, calling him Stewie, and from there on I knew.
Jimmy Races. Jimmy was racing his car on the highway. He was going way too fast. He hit a sign on the freeway. His front bumper of his car fell off. Jimmy stopped racing his car afterwards.

Playing in a Band. Martin enjoyed playing the guitar. He had always wanted to be in a band. One day he met a new friend who played the drums. Martin and his friend formed their own band. They had fun playing their music at parties.

Spaghetti. Kathy loved to love. Her speciality was spaghetti. She decided to cook for her family. As she was cooking, she knocked a bottle in the sauce. When she served the dish, she realized it and it was horrible.

Coming Out. Jonathan came out to his parents as gay. His parents were mortified. They told him to get out of the house. He spent that night in his car. The next day, they apologetically let him come home.

Dylan's new car. Dylan's dad is excited to give him a car. Dylan has worked very hard in school. He's met all his parents expectations. Dylan choose an economical Honda Civic. He loves his fuel efficient car.

New App Department. Jo has been learning more about apps and program coding. His employer was looking for more ways to expand the business. Jo proposed his idea for a new shopping app for the company. His boss loved it and told Jo to supervise a new team to work on it. Jo agreed and helped expand the business with his new app team.

Bob and the Donkey. Bob was an obese, dour old bachelor. He owned a small manufacturing company that he ran with an iron fist. At the company picnic, someone convinced him to go on a donkey ride. The sight of him swaying back and forth amused his employees. The humorous memory helped them cope with him going forward.

Tail rider. I was driving home from school. This truck was driving near me for several minutes. Regardless of where I turned, it followed me. The driver rolled down the window and smiled at me. Although I was mad at him, I smiled him back.
Lost charge. I was working on my laptop today. Unfortunately I had only a few percent left of battery. I was so close. Ultimately it ended up dying. I couldn't even recharge it.

Becca's Christmas Kitten. Becca really wanted a kitten for Christmas. She wrote a letter to Santa saying a new kitten was all she wanted. She hinted about a kitten to her parents every day. Becca even drew pictures of kittens and hung them all over the house. On Christmas morning, she awoke to a little kitten in her bed.

Science Dissection. Kate was in biology. Their lab groups were dissecting frogs. Kate did not like the idea of dissection but knew she had to. She decided to let her partner do the cutting. When it came to the lab test, Kate failed.
A Hot Day. Cindy was in line to wait to pick up her daughter from school. She turned off her car. Cindy rolled her windows down. It was hot outside. Cindy rolled up her windows and put the AC on.

Robot Fighting. Jane was really into technology. She learned of a robot fighting league. Jane decided to build a robot to compete. She got a team together and built a good one. She was able to make it to the top five.

Knitting. Josue was trying out a new knitting pattern. She knit a few rows. Somehow each row was longer than the last. She unravelled it all and started again. Surely it would work out fine this time.

Large water slide. Susie went to the local pool. To her delight there was a water slide. Susie was thrilled. She went on it as she pleased. But she was yelled at because she did not alert the lifeguard.

Cat eats the Dog Treats. The cat was feeling very energetic this evening. He decided to tear into the dog treats. He viciously ripped open the packaging and ate the treats. His owner found the place in a mess when he got home. The owner cleaned up the mess angrily.

Jane and Cat. One day Jane decided to go for a walk in the park. She got her tennis shoes and headed to the park. Once at the park Jane noticed a cat on a park bench. Jane didn't see a collar on the cat. Jane took the cat home and made it her pet.
Surfing Scare. Chelsea loved surfing. One day she fell off of her surfboard while surfing. A huge wave was coming upon her. She climbed back onto her board quickly. She floated safely above the wave.

Girl Friend. Timmy just started kindergarten. He's nervous about meeting new people and making friends. Wednesday he met a girl named Jessie who asked to be his friend. Timmy had never made friends with a girl before but he agreed. Twelve years later, Timmy and Jesse finish school as best of friends.

Chatty Kathy. Kathy had delayed the game by talking up a storm. Her boyfriend was annoyed, but had gotten used to the treatment. He politely interrupted Kathy to remind her that it was her turn. She looked at everyone and her faced turned red. After apologizing, we all went back to playing the board game.
Scuffed. Bella had a new pair of white sneakers. She loved them! She tried to keep them spotlessly clean. But at school, she got them muddy. Bella was unhappy with herself.

Slow Internet. Eric was playing his favorite online shooter game. He kept on losing in the game. It was because his internet was too slow. Eric called up his internet company. He purchased a faster internet package for $20 more a month.

Baseball Slide. Tom was in little league. He was on base and someone got a hit. He ran for the next base as best he could. The ball was thrown at the same time. Tom was able to just barely slide onto the plate.

Lester Jumps Rope. Lester notices that he has gained a lot of weight over the Year's. He decides to begin exercising to lose weight. Lester starts by jumping rope each day before school. He trips a lot at first but he gradually improves. Lester is happy he is finally doing something about his weight.
Peanut. There is dog name Peanut. Peanut is a pit bull who lives in a house with 5 kids. The kids love to pick on him. He wanted to be left alone. Peanut found himself a good hiding spot.

Water Skiing. Angelina had never been water skiing before. It was her first time and she was very nervous. She got setup behind the boat. The boat took off and for a brief second she was skiing! She fell face first into the water, but kept trying until she got it.

Angkor Wat. Neil was visiting Cambodia. He took a tour to the ruins of Angkor Wat. There, he learned about the old temples. He took lots of photos of the beautiful jungle ruins. He was so happy with his visit to Angkor Wat!

Worse Than Before. Lucy was on the phone with her friend Amy. Amy was at a party for another friend. Lucy wanted to feel included. But being on the phone was worse than not being there. Lucy got off the phone with Amy, and sat alone in her room.

Horatio Finds a Job. Horatio has spent months looking for work. He applies to many jobs but he cannot find one. Finally a friend tells him that they have a job opening at her bar. Horatio applies successfully for the bartending job. Horatio feels great that he has finally found a job.

The Cookie Burn. Blair was making sugar cookies on Christmas Eve. She popped them in the oven and left to clean up a bit. Suddenly she remembered her cookies minutes too late. To her dismay all of them had burnt to crisps. Luckily she was able to whip a new, better batch quickly.

Construction Workers. Every time Lora walked past construction workers they would catcall. She was so sick of the things they would say. She started calling back with her own offensive remarks. This made the workers uncomfortable. They stopped bothering Lora, but they still catcalled other women.
Borrowed Money. Jane picked out a new doll from the store. She went to pay for the doll. The cashier told her the price was three dollars. Jane only had two dollars. The cashier loaned Jane a dollar.

Scuba Diving. Today was Jill's first day of scuba diving. As soon as she was submerged in the water, she was fascinated. Not only did she see many fish, but she came across several plants. She remained in the water for 1-2 hours. Afterwards, she got out and thanked the instructor.
Preacher. The preacher didn't have Sunday's speech ready. He was busy doing charity. There was no time to prepare one. He decided to talk off the top of his head. The congregation loved it.

The evil dad. A man took his fussy 4 month old baby for a drive. Later on that day he called the cops claiming someone took his baby. The cops didn't believe the man and arrested him. He confessed to killing the baby by accident and buried her. The evil dad was charged and is now serving life in prison.

sad news. Zack loved his car. He had purchased it when he was seventeen. One day he hit an icy patch on the road and wrecked his car. He was devastated about the wrecked car. Zack know refuses to drive his car in the winter.

College. My niece's daughter Kayla got accepted to two colleges recently. She got into the University of Maine and Salem State College. She did not get accepted into their nursing divisions, however. Her mother was upset, causing Kayla to get angry. We tried to tell her mom not to be such a stage mother.

Punishment. Gina had to go the principal's office. Her teacher had told her to go right away. The whole class was staring at her as the teacher spoke to her. Gina was embarrassed that everyone knew she was in trouble. Gina decided to stay at her desk, and refuse to go.

Skip almost drowns. Skip is with his friends at the lake. Skip wishes he could join them. Skip doesn't know how to swim. While standing next to the lake one of his friends push him in. Skips falls in and almost drowns before one of his friends saves him.
Dog. Ana adopted a puppy. At first she struggled to care for it. She sometimes even forgot to take it out! But in time, she learned what to do. Soon Anna and her puppy were best friends.

A big hike. Jenna was going on a long hike. For the first part of the hike, she trekked deep into a canyon. Then, she climbed up a winding cliff side. At the top of this tall peak, she climbed out to the edge. At the end of the hike, she was standing a huge peak.

Ice Cream Day. Ted opened the door to the ice cream parlor. He knew what he product he wanted until he saw it. The new flavor sparkled enticingly in the case. Ted was drawn to it, floating effortlessly to the display case. He requested a taste test before buying the new ice cream flavor.

I love her too. Maria really loved Guillermo. But Guillermo loved his neighbor Sara. They stayed like this for a long time. However, Maria found out about Guillermo's feelings. As a result, a huge fight broke out.

Jeff goes to the lake. Jeff needed a break from the city life. He was planning a trip to the countryside. He figured he would go visit the lake. Jeff ended up staying and fishing at the lake. Jeff had the best time at the lake.

The Saturation Point of Swiss Cheese. Little Kelly loved Swiss cheese so much. She ate it every afternoon as her snack. She ate it, and it alone, for hundreds of days in a row as her snack. One day, she was shocked to suddenly find it foul and nauseating. It was twenty years before she could eat Swiss cheese again.

Easier Sanctimonious Than Done. Nina committed to taking the Live Below The Line challenge. She bought all the food she could with the allowed money. She ate it all in the first day and was still very hungry. She battled with her hunger for hours and hours. Nina gave up on experiencing poverty and ordered a pizza.

Tara's Hat. Tara had lost her brand new hat. She looked everywhere for her hat. She was about to give up when she looked at her dog's house. The dog had a few scraps of fabric in his mouth. He had eaten the hat.

Recycled Cans. I went to my car to drive to school. I noticed that I was out of gas and had no money. I took a bag of cans and what gas I had and went to the store. I recycled my cans and got money in return. I took the money, bought gas and went to class.

Cake. I ordered a cake for my son's birthday. He didn't like regular cake. I ordered an ice cream cake from baskin robbins instead. When I picked it up, it had mini ice cream cones on top. We all thought it was adorable and delicious.

Jake Falls Off Ladder. Jake's cat was stuck in the tree. He tried to climb a ladder to get him. Jake fell off the ladder and fell down. His cat climbed down the tree by herself. Jake's cat went to lick him afterwards.

Slide. Patrick and his friends were bored one night. They decided to goof around on the local playground. Patrick's friends dared him to go down the child slide. He went but got stuck in the middle. Patrick felt extremely foolish for making such a mistake.

Grocery Games. John needed to get milk at the grocery store. He drove to the store and began making his way to the dairy aisle. John saw other items that he wanted to buy. He ended up filling his cart with groceries. After he returned home, John realized that he forgot to buy milk.
Track and Field Star. I always wanted to be a runner. I decided to join track and field. We practiced hard all summer. I was excited for the 1 mile run event. I won the race easily.

Officer Helps. Lucy was lost and didn't know her grandparents address. She was at a police station to get help. She was crying as she explained to an officer. He smiled and offered her something to eat. Lucy hungrily ate the candy bar, and soda the officer gave her.

Sharing. Darcy offered Ryan the last of her cigarette. She was finished, and thought he might want some. He said that he did, but only if she was finished. She was finished, so gave it to him. Ryan finished the cigarette.

wallet. Ethan found a wallet in the men's room one day. He looked inside and saw money and credit cards. Ethan was tempted by the cash. But then he resolved to do the right thing. Ethan took the wallet to the lost-and-found right away.

Roller Coaster. One day, my friends and I went to an amusement park. One of our friends claimed he could eat anything and not throw up. We decided to test this, and we made him eat 4 funnel cakes. We proceeded to go on the fastest roller coaster we could find. After the ride, our friend threw up three times.

The water on the books. Madison was washing the dishes. She was cleaning a big bowl when water sloshed out. The water poured down the counter towards her cook books. The books became soaking wet along the bottoms. From then on the paper looked slightly warped.

Christmas Shopping. Nikki liked to be ahead of schedule. She started Christmas shopping in September. Soon, she had all her presents bought and wrapped. She was relieved to have all the hectic parts of the holiday done. She was excited to enjoy the rest of the season!

Dave goes fishing. Dave loved going fishing with his dad. Unfortunately, his dad had been very busy the past few weeks. Today though, his father came in his room and told Dave to get ready. Dave's father had the day off from work! Dave and his father went fishing, and Dave caught a huge fish.

Rick's Poor Time Management. Rick sat down at his computer, about to do work. His attention was immediately diverted by a computer game. His wife pointed out that he was supposed to be working. Rick argued with her, taking his time on the game. Rick didn't finish his work in time, resulting in lost profits.

Faker. One day my niece's six year old son acted up in school. He acted like he had a seizure. My niece picked him up from the nurse's office. She took him to Children's Hospital, and he was found to be ok. He later told his mom he had faked the whole thing.

Cookies. Tom wanted to eat something delicious. He also wanted to be a healthy person. He saw oatmeal raisin cookies at the store. He thought that oatmeal and raisins were both healthy. He bought the oatmeal raisin cookies.

Stage. Cynthia was working in a theater. She had been tasked with cleaning the stage. Mop in hand, she stepped onto the stage. Under her feet, she could feel the grime stuck to the floor. She knew then that cleaning it by herself would be impossible.

Great American Story. Sal thought he'd write the next great novel. He wrote a few different short stories to test them out. Sal sent them off to his friends to read. The friends pretended to read and lied about their opinion. Sal felt very grateful to his deceptive friends.

Soapmaking Disaster. Nicole read about soapmaking and decided to try it. She gathered all the ingredients after reviewing the instructions. It went well at first though soon she started experimenting. Her experimentation did her grand project in. She was left with bowls and trays full of unusable sludge.

Bacteria. Caro and her friends swam at the lake all day. But that night on the news, Caro saw an alarming advisory. They said that the lake's bacterial levels were dangerously high! Caro was afraid she or her friends might get sick from their swim! Luckily, though, none of them became ill after swimming.

Eyebrow pulling. Rosie had a problem with her anxiety. It caused her to pull out her eyebrows. One night, she absentmindedly pulled out tons of eyebrows. In the morning she looked in the mirror and saw bald patches. She was so embarrassed she used makeup to cover it up.

New Bag. Ben put all his things in his bag to get ready for school. He had no more room when he was finished. Ben decided that it was time for a bigger bag. He took out his phone and bought one on the internet. Ben selected next day delivery and waited.

The Dog. Timothy walked through the park with his dog. All of a sudden, his dog pulled on the leash. Timothy fell, and the dog ran away. Timothy looked for the next hour for his dog. He finally found him humping a woman's leg.

Choose. Gina and Tami were at their desk. Gina began talking to Tami about Mary's betrayal. Yesterday Tami agreed with Gina's assessment of the situation. Today she seemed to be making excuses for Mary. Gina hid her anger and began doing her classwork.

Ridiculing. Jeff walked into his class with a new haircut. Everyone couldn't get their eyes off of the small puff behind his head When Jeff sat down, he felt something behind his head. Jamal tried to stick his pencil into Jeff's curls. Jeff got mad and raised his head to remove the pencil.

Low Carbs. Karen decided to go on a low-carb diet. One day, she found herself craving spaghetti and meatballs. Since pasta is a carb Karen looked for recipes with substitutes. She decided to make the noodles from spaghetti squash instead. It was so disgusting, she ordered a pizza.

Ice Cream Truck. Ron and Kate were playing outside. But it was a burning hot day. They decided to go back inside. But then they heard an ice cream truck. They enjoyed eating ice cream outside together.

Snow Cone Surprise. Timmy loved snow cones. He asked his parents for a snow cone maker for Christmas. He waited patiently all Christmas eve night. A large gift was waiting for him in the center of the room. He opened it quickly and smiled looking at his snow cone maker.

First day of Seventh grade. It was Christian's first day of Seventh grade. He was very nervous. His mom made him a special breakfast to calm his nerves. Christian ate his breakfast and got on the school bus. He got to school and found new friends, which made him feel better.
Expired plan. Allie had a prepaid phone. She had to refill it every month. The month had ended. Allie had a zero balance. She couldn't use it until she refilled it.
A Milk-Tooth. Little John was eating a cake. When he bit his cake he lost a milk-tooth. He started to cry. Mom calmed him down. They put the milk-tooth under the pillow at night.

Mantis. The praying mantis waited patiently for it's prey. The mantis was very still and perfectly camouflaged. It waited and waited for days and days. Eventually a fly landed right in front of it. It lunged and snapped up the fly and slowly ate it up.

Mother knows best. Lisa would tell her son Jimmy not to run in the store. He ran as fast as he could with not a single care. His mom pleaded to him to stop embarrassed for her son. He was laughing looking back when he didn't notice a can in front. He fell and broke his nose never to run again, a hard lesson learned.

The Eyebrow Burn. Trina was cooking on her stovetop. She leaned in to check on something and felt a sudden heat blast. Before she knew it, her eyebrows were completely charred away. It took a long time for her to regrow those hairs. Finally one day she looked back to normal.

Scared. Sally woke up one morning to find her fish not moving at the bottom. She was too scared to check to see if he was alive or not. Sally's crying caused her mother to come into the room. Sally explained her fish wasn't moving, so her mom checked for her. Thankfully, he was just sleeping.
The Kitten. I always wanted a pet. I finally decided to get one. I went to the pet store. I saw a pretty kitten. I decided to buy the kitten!

Gloves. Jake had just moved to Michigan from Florida. He did not own any winter clothes and wasn't anticipating the cold. When he arrived at his hotel room he realized his hands were freezing! Jake knew he needed gloves and walked to the drugstore. When he arrived he found a free promotion giving away gloves!

The Bonus. Allie was determined to do well on her project. She was in charge of organizing the annual fundraiser. She called countless donors. When the final numbers were in, Allie had surpassed her goal. Her bosses were so pleased, they gave her a bonus!
Tired. Kia's baby was very fussy. He cried off and on all night. Kia did her best to soothe him. She got very little sleep. She was tired all the next day!

Group Activity. Our group was given a map with instructions. We were following the directions to arrive to a certain place. Everyone moved passed the cafeteria and portables. Once we reached the targeted area, we used shovels to dig the ground. We noticed a treasure chest in the ground.

Need a Job. Having just been fired, Rick needed a new job as soon as possible. Rick just wanted to work, he didn't care what field the job was in. He went to every local business, but none of them were hiring. Being inventive, Rick decided to create his own job for himself. Rick started charging people to have him look over their resumes!

Study Up. Elvin needed an A on his Final exam to pass his class. He hired a tutor to help him study. He studied day and night until he felt confident in the material. Elvin went to class prepared for the test. He had the second highest score in the class, and he passed.

The camp pen pal. Jordan was about to go home from Summer camp. She had made a close friend and they exchanged addresses. They promised that they would remain in touch. Jordan wrote her a letter as soon as she got home. They remained pen pals for years after.

Jane's nail party. Jane was super excited to have a nail party with her friends. The party was at the local nail salon that was brand new. When the girls entered the salon, they were greeted kindly. They picked the polish and the artist worked her magic. The girls were then pleased with the results.

New Music. I was trying to broaden my musical horizons. I asked friends for recommendations of things to listen to. One of my pals told me to check out classical music by Tchaikovsky. One of my pals told me to check out glam rock by Def Leppard. I ended up loving both, and thanked my friends for the help.

Sam's Sail. Sam loved to sail his boat. He decided to sail to his friends in a different state. He began his trip but soon came upon a storm! He took shelter from the storm under the deck! When he came back up, his sail had been torn to shreds!

The Casino. My parents enjoy going to the casino. When I turned 21 they took me with them. I had no luck with the slot machines or betting on the races. My parents made out pretty well and each won a nice sum. Ever since I leave the gambling to my parents.

Construction. Chris was running late to work. He tried to take a shortcut away from the highway. However, when he did, he ended up in a construction zone. He had to wait for the workers to finish. Once they were done he was able to pass, but he was still late.

The Little Pig. There once was a pig named Wilbur. He had a mate named Wilbur. Shilbury was cute, with a perfect pig snoot. She and Wilbur lived a happy pig life. Until they got killed for their meat.

Thief. Ray walked home from school everyday. And he noticed that the same man had his garage open every Monday. One Monday, Ray watched the man work on his car. And he noticed that the man went inside occasionally. He waited for the right moment stole items from the garage.

The Garage. The couple's new house was a big upgrade from their apartment. They were most excited about their big garage! It could fit both their cars in it. They could also store all their possessions in it. The couple couldn't wait to move in!
Total scare. I was walking in the city yesterday. I was underground. Near the train I saw a blind woman. She looked lost. Thankfully I helped her.

Oogum Boogum. I  thought the Oogum Boogum song contained bad words. I bought the cd to find out if my suspicions were true. I played the Oogum Boogum song over and over. I repeatedly listened to each and every word. Now I know the song does not contain any bad words.

Boredom. Lucy knelt in front of her toy box. She searched through the toys. She was looking for nothing specific. She was hoping something would catch her attention. After 20 minutes she gave up on toys, and went to jump rope alone.

Too Much. Cal ate too much for supper. His stomach was feeling sort of sour. He drank a white carbonated beverage. After a little while his stomach felt better. Cal resolved not to eat so much from now on.

Lilly's Song. Lilly was desperately trying to write a new song. Unfortunately, she had been suffering from writer's block. So she put on some old jazz music for inspiration. All of a sudden a new chord progression popped into her head! She ended up writing the best song of her career.

Money for Groceries. I'd been doing some extra work, building a wish fulfillment fund. As the holidays approached, we got hit with unexpected bills. I had surgery, our dog became ill, and the furnace needed repairs. I knew my fund wouldn't be going for the whimsical wishes I'd planned. Instead, it put a Thanksgiving feast on the table, and I was grateful.
The Cave. The kids were exploring. They stumbled on a cave in the woods. The crept inside. It was dark and creepy. It was a wonderful place to explore for the afternoon!
Messed up baking. Susie was bad at baking. But she wanted to get better. So she decided she was going to learn. She went to a class. But she messed up all the recipes.

The Rental Car. Greg took his family on vacation. They got a rental car at the airport. While they drove, a semi swerved and hit them! Greg was very nervous that the rental agency would charge him a lot. His insurance company said they would take care of it.

Mystery. There was a fly buzzing around in the bathroom. Since I needed to go, I went to the bathroom in spite of the fly. When I came out of the bathroom, the fly had disappeared. Where did the fly go? Theories from friends include that I had eaten the fly.

Albert's Girl Problems. Albert liked a girl that never liked him back. The girl would date other guys and complain about them to Albert. Albert grew tired of the stories and stopped talking to the girl. She realized what she was missing and told Albert how she felt. Albert forgave her and the two began to date.

Coup d'etat. Paul started a Facebook group to help people with a common interest. Paul's group grew to have over 3,000 members and many admins. Paul did not feel the need to consult other admins. Paul kicked out several people whom he did not like. The other admins kicked Paul out of his own group.

Wine. Tonight, my husband brought home a bottle of wine. He had a hard day at work and wanted to enjoy a nice dinner at home. We ordered take out and drank our wine. He told me about his day. Things will be better tomorrow.

Trade Argument. Billy and Rob were angry at each other over a proposed trade. Rob accused Billy of cheating him of a vintage card. Billy got upset and decided to call the whole thing off. Things are getting worse as Rob spreads rumors about Billy. Not wanting to be known as a cheater, Billy is out to confront Rob.
Danny moves out. Danny was in his 30s. He still lived at home with his parents. Danny decided he wanted to be independent. He took a good job. Danny moved away from his parents.

The stolen bike. Sean rode a bike to work. He always parked the bike out back near the trash. One night, he came out to find his bike gone. They watched the security tapes. Sean saw that his bike had been stolen by a masked man.

Relaxing Weekend. Andy had been looking forward to Friday night all week. It was a busy, stressful week of work, and he wanted to relax. He decided to spend the evening watching movies. He also ordered takeout so he wouldn't have to cook dinner. After watching movies and unwinding, Andy felt quite refreshed!

The American Dream. Sanjay was a poor man in India. He decided to move to America for better opportunities. He worked hard for a plane ticket. He moved to America. He opened up a business in Boston and achieved the American Dream.

Mile Club. Rick wanted to fly to Hawaii to visit his brother. Airline rates were abnormally high and he couldn't afford it. Rick remembered he earned a lot of miles on his credit card. He checked his rewards online and he had just enough to fly roundtrip. Rick was relieved that he had enough miles to see his brother.

The Swimming Test. Candace was at camp and wanted to canoe. In order to canoe you first had to pass a swim test. Candace was nervous about the test but she gave it her all. During the extended wading time, she almost gave up. Luckily she pushed through her tiredness and passed.
Elizabeth's Bedroom. Elizabeth needed a change. She decided to redo her bedroom. She changed it from pink to teal. It felt more grownup and mature. Elizabeth couldn't wait to show it off!

Migraines Or A Career. I went to the doctor today to find out what's wrong with me. He diagnosed me with migraines. He said loud sounds or bright lights can make it worse. I am a drummer in a heavy metal band. I guess I have to choose between feeling good or having a job.

Deadly consequences. Joanne owned 10 dogs. She loved them so much and spoiled them. One day she brought home new snacks she bought at the store. She fed them to her dogs. Unknowingly, the treats were poisoned and all the dogs died.

Acting strangely. Gerard came to work in his underwear that morning. He didn't realize until his secretary told him. Embarrassed, he went back home to change. But he couldn't find his house again. He was surprised when the doctor later said he was losing his memory.

Digs. I was in a really good mood. Then I logged into the forum I shared with my husband. Yet again, he was making cruel digs at me. I suddenly became very sad and angry. I decided I wasn't going to put up with it anymore, and told him so.

Highway. Ryan was stuck in traffic on the main roads. He was late to work, so he decided to try a new route. He passed on to a highway that he had never seen before. He felt lucky at first, believing that he found a shortcut to work. However, he quickly discovered it was still under construction.

Expensive Accident. The grass really needed cutting. He went out to start the mower and left the door open. He started mowing and got close to the open glass door. As he got close to the door, the mower went over a stone. The stone shot out and shattered the glass door.

Rick and the Ball. Rick was in the yard playing. Daddy arrived and gave Rick a shiny new ball. The ball was half as tall as Rick. Rick ran and jumped on the ball, but he fell. Rick cried when daddy took the ball away.

Prom. Kyana was going to the junior prom. She had had to buy a secondhand dress due to the price. She was afraid people would notice and mock her. But at the prom, she got a lot of compliments on her beautiful dress! Kyana was relieved and very happy!

First Night. Peri gets a job as a waitress at a sports bar. She is very nervous on her first night. She decides to have a couple of drinks before her shift. When she carries her first tray out she trips and falls. She spills the food all over the people at the table.

An Amazing Woman. I saw her at the checkout line. She dropped a can and I reached to help her pick it up. Our hands met and we both awkwardly giggled. I told her my name and asked for her number. She told me to stop being a creep.
School play jitters. Lulu was in the school play. The event was tonight. She was very nervous. She got on stage and froze because she forgot her lines. Thankfully no one could tell.
Cheap candy. Suzy was having a major candy craving. She was craving some sour gummies. When she went to drugstore she saw all the candy. Suzy was salivating. She decided to buy some immediately.

Drained Battery. Sam was at the mall. When he went to his car he noticed the headlights were on. He had forgotten to turn them off. When he got in the car wouldn't turn over. He had to have someone help jump start him.

College Graduate. Felix just graduated college. He moved back home with his parents. He now has a degree, no job and a lot of debt. He job hunted all summer and finally landed a job. Felix is excited to start getting paid for all his student loans.

Elephants. Tim loves elephants. He has wanted to see an elephant in the wild his entire life. For his honeymoon, Tim convinces his wife to go on safari. Tim and his wife travel to Kenya to go on safari. Tim is finally able to see an elephant up close.

Bedroom. Gina's older brother was gone for good. She was sad and happy at the same time. It would be weird not seeing him around all the time. She went to his room and stood there staring at his things. She realized there was now a spare room available.

Cooper and the tadpole. Cooper was playing out in the rain. While playing in the rain he collected a tadpole. He brought the tadpole inside and put it in a bucket with some water. A few days later it was a frog. Cooper was so confused!

Bad Bridge. Frank was hauling bowling balls in his truck. He drove his truck to a bridge to cross a river. When the truck was-way over it, he felt a shake. The bridge began to collapse. Frank screamed as he tumbled into the water.

Work. Joe broke Cindy's smartphone. Joe was very ashamed, so he promised to pay her back. Cindy told him that it cost 300 dollars. Joe couldn't afford this, so he offered to work it off. Cindy had him shovel manure for two weeks.
All You Can Eat. I worked at a water park. People had private parties. One time there was free barbecue. We could have as much as we wanted. That only happened once.
The Last Bus. Tom was working late. He left right before the last bus home. Unfortunately it passed early and he missed it. Tom had no way of getting home. He decided to just sleep at work instead.
Note. Cathy knocked on the door. Nobody answered. Cathy left a note for the resident. The residents neighbor took it. The neighbor brought the note over the next day.
Trapped Cat. Tom heard meowing in his apartment building. He didn't know where it was coming from. Tom looked around for days. He eventually found him between some walls. Tom was able to rescue it.

Caught in the rain. Jane was out for a walk. She heard some rumbling in the clouds and it began to rain. She tried to hurry and run the rest of the way. It was too late, by the time she got home she was already soaked. She took a hot shower and dried her clothes.

The Sunscreen. Jennifer was worried about her kids. They were at the pool and had forgotten their sunscreen. When they came home, their skin was all red. Jennifer put aloe on them and warned them not to do that again. They promised they would be more responsible.

Bicycle Accident. Alyssa and Caitlin were riding their bicycles. They collided while riding towards each other. Caitlin had suffered a big cut on her knee. Fortunately, Alyssa was no hurt. Caitlin cried and decided never to ride a bicycle again.

Going to the Park. Ken went to the park to walk around. He needed to clear his head. The air was crisp and the mood was lazy. Ken enjoyed walking on the soft grass. It helped him get in a better state of mind.

Lost. Rodriguez decided to go hiking in the mountains. After climbing some time, he realized no landmarks looked familiar. Rodriguez tried to retrace his steps, to no avail. He screamed for help, and waited for a response. All he heard was his own echo.

The Climb. The minister had to fix the weathervane on top of the church steeple. He said a prayer and climbed up the side of the church. When he was half-way up he saw a car roll through a stop sign. The minister yelled at the driver to be more careful. The driver didn't see him and thought god was yelling at him.

Water for Cats. My cat, in usual fashion, darted up to the sofa's edge. Though a normal greeting from him, it was met by surprise! My empty glass, hanging by my pinky, had almost been dropped. Nothing had spilled, but I wondered why I'd reacted so strongly. He then drank from a glass on that sofa, without anyone's permission!

Paycheck. Laura was excited for her next paycheck. There were a lot of things she wanted to buy. It was gone almost as soon as she got it. She spent it all on things she wanted. Now she had to wait another two weeks to get the things she needs.

Gymnastics. My little girl decided she wanted to be a gymnast. We signed her up at a gym. She tried to do flips, tumbles and the balance beam. It was a lot harder than it looked. Now my daughter wants to be a dancer!

The Wedding. Rick's eldest daughter was 4 year's old. She was going to be the flower girl in a wedding. She got a white dress and a pearl bracelet. She went and had her hair styled with the bride. Rick thought she was the most beautiful girl in the wedding.
Internet Addiction. Tom was addicted to the internet. It started causing trouble in his relationship. His girlfriend wanted him to cut down. Tom agreed to do so. It was hard but it helped him out.

Fallen Tree. Ralf loved Christmas time. He helped decorate the family tree this year. It was all finished except for the star on top. He reached and stretched to place the star on the very top. Losing his balance, Ralf fell into the tree knocking it down.
Lazy. Derek was lazy. So he decided to work fewer and fewer hours. He decided to quit college too. But several years later, he needed more money. And he regret being so lazy.

Break. Ellen was planning to do her homework. But she decided to take a break. When she woke up, however, it was already the next morning. And she only finished half of her homework on the bus. Ellen decided not to be so careless about breaks.

Bryan and the song. Bryan was looking for a song he heard on the radio. He spent 20 minutes looking for the name of the song. After not being able to find it, he started typing in the lyrics. Google found the song through the lyrics. Bryan was happy so he bought the song through itunes.

Roberto's Job Search. Roberto moved to New York City to be with his girlfriend of 4 years. He moved in with her and her family. Her dad told him if he didn't find a job he would have to leave. He interviewed for several positions but didn't get any of them. With no place to live, he had to move back to California.

Fast car. Lionel bought a new fast car. He was so proud, he took it out on the highway to try it out. He accelerated until he reached the speed limit and pushed it further. He had a big smile on when his car hit a truck next to him. The ambulance came and even if Lionel was fine, his car wasn't.

Sabrina is crushed. Sabrina meets a new friend at school. They quickly become best friends. One day Sabrina hears her best friend saying bad stuff. Sabrina hears her friend tell her she is using her. Sabrina is crushed that her friend is not really her friend.

Vacation. Tom was feeling like he needed to get away. Tom scheduled a weekend at a beach hotel. Tom was excited when that weekend finally came. Tom enjoyed unwinding while at the beautiful coast. Tom returned to work on Monday feeling like a new man!

Scary Snake. Ellen has a garden in her backyard. Ellen is very proud of her garden. Recently, Ellen discovered rabbits eating her vegetables. Ellen bought a plastic snake from a garden supply store. The plastic snake is keeping the rabbits out of Ellen's garden.

The candle choice. Mari had been wanting to buy a candle. She was perusing the shelf trying to choose one. She smelled the candles one by one. She realized that she wasn't actually that into any of the scents. She didn't want to waste the money so she just passed on a candle.

Lacrosse. John and Jare had season tickets to la crosse. They loved going to the games each week. It was such a hard and fast sport. They even bought jerseys to show their pride They knew lacrosse season was their favorite season.

The tractor. Bob bought a tractor one day. He used it for pulling logs back to his farm house. Bob would then cut the wood and sell it. He made enough money to pay for the tractor. Bob is glad he purchased the tractor.

Showing Is Believing. Charles was determined to be a sales champion. He made a sale his first day on the sales floor. Three days later he had a prospect who wanted to buy but wouldn't. Charles called the customer he previously helped. That customer convinced the prospect to buy, he had good service.

Crushes. Freddy had a crush on Helen. He told Helen that he did but Helen said she's not into him. They decided to remain friends. Later on, he hears that Helen actually find out hideous. He is hurt badly and decides not to hang out with her.

Onions and Garlic. I needed some garlic for tonight's dinner. When I went to the grocery store they were out. I thought I'd substitute onions instead. It didn't go well and I ruined the dish I was trying to make. I'll never substitute ingredients again.
Just Beachy. George challenged Sara to a swim off. It was in the ocean instead of the pool. Sara is such a strong swimmer. She easily beat George. He was disappointed but congratulated her.

Student Loans. Sam graduated college and moved back home with his parents. He wanted to take the summer off to relax from his last semester. He eventually became too lazy, never finding a job for a year. Sam's student loans kicked in and made him realize he needs work. He went out that day with a mission to get his life on track.

Forgetful Daisy. Daisy loved her new bike. She was given it by her late grandad. One afternoon, she went to get it, but it wasn't there. She was very upset because it was all she had of her grandad. After crying for hours, she realised it was safe in her other shed.

Aaron. Aaron was a very sweet and funny boy. At school he always joked around and made others laugh. His teacher and friends could always count on him to brighten the day. One day he was gone and the whole day was a little sad. Everyone was so glad when Aaron came back.

Cold, wet lesson. I went for a hike in the canyon yesterday morning. It was a warm, sunny morning so I only wore a flannel shirt. By noon, the weather changed to a nasty, windy, icy storm. I had to take shelter under a rock ledge for four hours! Finally reaching home, I vowed to never go hiking unprepared.

Tails. Lambo Rusty was a food eating champion. He had several medals for hotdogs and hot wings. One day he saw an ad for a milkshake competition. He had a week to train, and did so with an advanced training regimen. Lambo came in second place, to a 5-year-old girl.

William loses the game. William is playing a game of basketball. He is down by just one basket. William goes up to shoot the game winning shot. William misses the shot badly. William was so disappointed he lost the game.

Blood Plasma. I used to donate blood plasma. One day I went to donate. They told me that I could no longer donate blood. I think it might have been because I tested a vaccine. You are not supposed to do that while donating.

Hummingbird Day. The hummingbirds visited the feeder all day long. Even though there were 4 drinking spots, they didn't share. Being very territorial, they chased each other away. One day, they fought each other until they were down to ground level. It was amazing to see!

Out. She awoke later than she had planned. She rolled over, realizing her alarm hadn't gone off. She reset the alarm and charged her phone. She went to take a long shower. She didn't care anymore about being late.
Question. The boy asked a question. Nobody knew the answer. He researched it in the library. He found the answer. He told everybody the answer to the question.

Loss of Energy. John exercised in the gym for several hours. He received a phone call from a manager. She reminded him of an interview they had today. John forgot about the interview and rushed home to clean himself. However, he fell asleep on the couch and woke up in the morning.

A Car Purchase. Maya wanted to buy a new car. She finally found a car that she really liked. The dealership didn't have it in the color that Maya wanted. They ordered a model in that specific color. Maya returned to buy the car.

Trying. Jenni wants to have more children. At the age of 52 it will be hard for her to do. Her doctor did some testing and thinks it is possible. She will need a few more tests to be sure. Jenni is willing to do anything because she really wants a baby.

IHOP. We went to the IHOP with our granddaughter and her parents on Monday. Our 2-year old granddaughter dictated what each person could eat. She said her nanny would have orange juice and her uncle pancakes. I was to have eggs while she was getting chocolate juice. We were amused by her choices.
Runaway Bride. Tom was going to get married. Everything was perfectly set up. He waited at the altar for a long time. His fiance never showed up. Tom had to cancel the wedding.

Colorado. When I was thirteen, my mother took me to Colorado for the first time. She always wanted to show me the place she went when she was young. It was beautiful and I loved it. Since then, I have been hoping to move to Colorado. I will get a chance to move there next year.

Insecurities; or How I Learned That Even Your Friends Will Hold You Back Because of Theirs. Her shirt said Kiss Me I'm A Nerd for nerd day homecoming week. He was the only one that offered to kiss her, and she accepted. His friends said she was too hot for him, so he never asked her out. She saved the last slow dance at homecoming for him, and it was nice. He never asked her out and never knew she liked him back.
Driving. Tom was driving his car. He wanted to take a scenic way home. He deliberately passed his exit. Tom saw many beautiful trees. Tom took the scenic way home.

Mexican Food. Jason wants to learn to cook Mexican food. Jason thinks he can do this in Mexico. Jason flies to Mexico. Jason takes a class at a cooking school. Jason become a good cook of Mexican food.
New album. Kelley really liked this new artist. Finally she went and bought the album. When she got it she played it numerous times. She was happy about it. She never wanted it to stop.
New Car. Sara needed a new car. Hers had too many miles and was old. She finally found one she liked. She was able to work out a great deal with the dealership. Sara drove the new car home.
Stampede. We went to the dixie stampede in Branson. We watched them ride horse and chase pigs. Our server brought us an entire chicken. There was lots of food and fun. We had a great time.
The Tie. Tom had a fancy event to go to. He had to wear a suit and tie. He rented all of it. Unfortunately he didn't know how to tie a tie. Tom had to look online to figure it out.

Puppy. Daniel was always a cat person, never liked dogs. He'd turn his nose up and walk away from a wagging tail. Then one day he heard a scratch at his back door. It was a small puppy, wagging and happy. Daniel's heart melted and he knew he had now become a dog person.

The Scam. Craig opened an e-mail that was too good to be true. Someone told him about $50,000 in a bank account he could withdraw. Next, Craig would deposit half the amount in another bank account. Craig did the scam and it worked! Police showed up on Craig and demanded he return all of the money.

The Swimming Lesson. Mary was scared of swimming. Her mother enrolled her in a swimming class. The teacher asked Mary to put her head under the water. Mary was scared but complied because she trusted the teacher. Soon, Mary was swimming like a dolphin!

Power Plant. Liza went for a walk with her dog. She saw a power plant. Liza hopped a fence and ventured inside. She was stopped by a guard and arrested on espionage. Liza was flabbergasted and gave up.

Snake Eating. I watched my snake try to eat a fish. First she grabbed it out of the tank. But it squirmed away and went on the gravel. She slithered back out of the fish tank. Grabbed the sucker and devoured him.

New Friends. Timmy had just moved to a new house. The neighbors came over with their son, Jimmy. They had bought pie and Timmy showed Jimmy his room. Jimmy and Timmy had a lot in common and played in Timmy's room. At first Timmy was sad to move but was happy to make a new friend.
The Orange. Tom was hungry. He spotted an orange on the kitchen table. He peeled it carefully. It was so juicy and good! Oranges were his favorite fruit.

Jake Goes Fishing. Jake has wanted to try fishing for many Year's. Finally he asks for two weeks away from his job. He travels to the river to try fishing for salmon. Jake eats the first salmon he catches from the river. Jake is very happy that he has finally gone fishing.

New Dog. Zoey's mom told her they could go pick out a new dog today. Zoey was so excited she ran to the car. They got to the pet store in no time. Zoey found a beautiful French Bulldog that she loved. Zoey's mom paid for the French Bulldog and they took him home!
Jimmy's Weight. Jimmy was overweight. Jimmy did not like being overweight. He started to work out. Jimmy also started eating better. After a few months Jimmy was in great shape.

Boiling Corn. One day Gina decided to boil some corn. She filled a large pot of water and brought to a boil. She stirred in sugar and lemon juice, dissolving the sugar. She gently placed ears of corn into boiling water. She let the corn cook for ten minutes.

Todd Helps Out. Todd was busy watching the news. All of a sudden, he heard a loud crash outside. A car had struck a tree in his front yard. Todd rushed outside to help the person in the car. Luckily, the other person was unhurt from the accident.

Reading Challenge. Erica's 2nd grade class had a reading challenge this year. If she was able to read 50 books or more she won a pizza party! She read a book every day for the entire semester. At the end of the semester Erica had read 85 books! Her teacher awarded her with a pizza party and icecream.
Bad reaction. Last week I went out to eat Chinese food. I got general tsao chicken. When I got home, I started eating. Unfortunately I started feeling sick. I realized I shouldn't go back there.
Dead Plants. Kim bought new plants. She was worried about keeping them alive. She made sure to water them often. They still got droopy and started dying. Kim realized she was over-watering\ them.

Skydiving. Sam Bell had a headache when he woke up that morning. He took some medicine, but to no effect. Sam got an idea. He went skydiving for the first time in his life. When he landed, his headache had disappeared.

Dancing shoes. Tammy was going dancing. She needed to find the perfect pair of shoes. She searched in three different stores and could not find any. She finally decided on a pair. Tammy could not wait to go out.

New Shoes. Tom needed a pair of new shoes for work. He went to the shoe store and asked for some help. The person working there recommended steel toe boots. Tom decided that he wanted something else. Tom bought regular boots instead.

Scary Sleepover. Mallorie was sleeping over at Jasmine's house. The girls had watched scary movies all night. The girls heard a strange noise in the dark. They were too scared to sleep. Mallorie and Jasmine stayed up all night with the lights on.
Phone. The phone started ringing. I went to pick it up. It stopped before I got there. There was a message for me. I listened to the message.
Ladoo. I saw an Indian movie this morning. A young child gave a Ladoo, a sweet, to an old woman. The woman then died. After watching the movie, I went to an Indian store. I bought a Ladoo and ate it.
Spider. It was 2 AM. And Carl saw a spider in his room. But it got away. He spend hours trying to find it and then gave up. When he woke up, he felt a terrible pain his arm.

Classroom. Frank was a school teacher. He was just assigned a new classroom. He went over to view his new place of work. He found it to be very dirty. He spent all evening cleaning it as best he could.

Katie Courier. Katie was asked by a stranger to deliver a package. She unwisely took the package of unknown contents. While delivering the package it tore open. Some of the toxic substance in it leaked out. She became very ill at the exposure to the contents.

Stamp collector. Gill had a large collection of stamps. She had collected stamps for most of her life. Her favourite stamp was one given to her by her late father. This stamp was extra special because her dad was given it by a prince. Gill treasures this stamp despite it's relatively small monetary value.
Loud Snoring. Tim started to snore as he got older. It frustrated his wife. They tried different solutions. None seem to work. Eventually Tim had to take medicine to breath better.

Tavon. Tavon was a sweet boy, but he was very lazy. When it came to doing work at school, he hated it. He always had a hard time turning papers in. One day his teacher helped him clean out all the papers in his desk. Tavon had to stay in from recess to work on all the work he didn't do.

Karate Class. I always wanted to learn karate. We spent a lot of time looking at different schools. My parents left the decision up to me. I chose the school that I liked the most. I have my first karate class on Thursday night.

The concert. I went to see my favorite band in concert. I didn't have enough money for tickets. I didn't know what to do. Someone with tickets really liked my shoes. So I traded my shoes for concert tickets.
Piano. Tom loved listening to the piano. He decided it was his favorite instrument. He wanted to learn how to play. He hired a piano teacher. He learned how to play the piano.

Fundraising. I agreed to run a local fundraiser for a candidate for office. I gathered the materials and went to the local mall. I set up my equipment and let the invited into the hall. I gave my pitch and asked them for their support. I was happy when we raised the amount we needed.

Money gambling. One of my best friends is named Mary. Mary once led me on a scavenger hunt for her birthday. It was extremely difficult. I didn't know what the final prize would be. I found it and it turns out the prize was $100.

Happy ending. Sam took his pet bird out for a walk. She couldn't fly, but when the wind gusted, she was lifted in the air. The bird was swept up into the top of a tall tree. Devastated, Sam waited at the foot of the tree all day. As dusk fell, the bird grew scared and fluttered down to Sam's feet.
Soda. Anna was on a diet. The thing she missed most was soda. One day she ordered a non-diet cola with her lunch. The calories distressed her, but still she smiled. It tasted so delicious!

Delivery. I was expecting a delivery the other day. The ETA said it'd be delivered by 8pm but it still wasn't here. After 9pm I called the company and they told me it was a mistake. They said it was delivered to the wrong address and they'd refund me! They sent me a refund, and also a brand new product.
Ants. Tom was walking on the beach. He was enjoying the feeling of sand in between his toes. He was admiring the sea. Suddenly, a large ant bit him, this caused him pain. He became upset.

Forgetful Bob. One day, Bob noticed that he was out of milk. Bob decided to make a trip to the grocery store. Bob picked up a few other things while shopping. When Bob decided that he was done, he checked out and headed home. When Bob got home, he realized that he forgot to buy milk.

New Hair. Dan realized that he was balding at a young age. Dan decided to see a doctor about his options. The doctor gave Dan many options, one of which was a hair transplant. Dan liked the idea of having a hair transplant, and decided to do it. Dan could not wait to see his new hair on his head.

Eggs. June hated eggs. She they were a good source of protein though. She decided to try them in an omelette form. She added all types of vegetables to the omelette. June snow likes eggs as an omelette.
Surprise at school. Nina was at school. Suddenly, her mom arrived to pick her up. Nina was confused. She asked her mom where they were going. They were going on a fun trip!
Fruit. I bought a new kind of fruit. It was pink with a white interior. It looked very pretty and delicious. The whole family ate some. We were all disappointed, as it was very bland.

Bank. Lee wanted to open a savings account. He saved up thirty dollars and then went to open the account. They gave him a debit card and helped him sign up. Soon he had his very own account. Lee couldn't wait to start saving!

Desk Builder. Tom bought a desk from the local department store. He brought into the office where the desk would be. Tom carefully unpacked all the components of the desk. Tom followed the direction step by step to build the desk. Tom was proud that he built a desk by himself!

Doctor. Tom wanted to attend medical school. Tom did not earn a scholarship and could not afford it. Tom's friend suggested he attend free medical school in Cuba. Tom attended the free medical school in Cuba. Tom eventually became a doctor.

Arcade night. Tony had used nearly all of his quarters at the arcade. He was down to his last quarter. He decided to use his final quarter on his favorite arcade game. Tony played better than he ever had. He managed to break the arcade game's longstanding high score!
Vegan. Ted loved eating meat. However his girlfriend was vegan. He could never decide on where to eat. Ted hated vegan food. Ted finally found an all you can eat buffet for both of them.

Big Deal. Bob sat down in Hank the lawyer's office. Hank explained that Bob had inherited some fine collectables. Hank led Bob to a storage room where there was many boxes. In each box there was a bounty of glass animals. Bob was a little disappointed in his inheritance but thankful.

Night Terrors. Tom suffered from night terrors. It made it hard to have women spend the night. He told his current girlfriend about it. She was very understanding and knew a lot about it. Tom felt more relaxed about her spending the night.
Yummy almonds. I went to the store yesterday. I saw some almonds. They were so good. I ate the whole can. Then I was very full.
Deep Cut. Tom was making dinner. He was dicing up a tomato. Tom's knife slipped and he cut himself. It was deeper than he thought. He had to put a large adhesive bandage on.

Tow Truck. Isaac's family was driving to a hotel for summer vacation. Their car broke down on the road. Isaac's parents called a tow truck. Isaac and his family had to ride in the tow truck to the gas station. Isaac thought it was the coolest day ever!
Hidden Keys. Tom was drunk at a bar with friends. He wanted to drive home. They couldn't convince him not to. Tom's friends hid his keys from him. Tom eventually passed out at the bar.
Bills big idea. Bill was going to win the science project He just needed a great idea He sat for hours and hours Finally it came to him! He was going to build a talking robot!

Online Dating. Victoria was talking to a man she met on the internet. They went out on several dates. She thought they had a nice time together. She began to worry when he stopped responding to her text messages. Victoria, although upset, gave up on the idea of that relationship.

The kitty finds a home. There was a little grey cat. He was lost in the world. He had no friends or family. One day a little girl spotted her. The little girl took her home and made her part of the family.
Lamb. My friend bought some lamb. He couldn't eat it all so he gave it to me. I had never eaten lamb before. I tried a piece. It was foul so I gave it back to my friend.

Amazing sunglasses. I went to the mall yesterday to check out some sunglasses. I could not believe how amazing the sunglasses were. When I tried some on, I asked for the price. The saleswoman told me they were one thousand dollars. I was shocked and immediately went home.

Sick Day. I had to call into work this morning because of the flu. I woke up feeling groggy, and realized I felt extremely hot and weak. My boss didn't take it too lightly, and was a little upset. But it's better than forcing myself into a situation I couldn't do. I think I'll go to sleep now, I'm losing my strength typing this.

Jenny's Accident. Jenny loved to skateboard with her friends after school. One day she decided not to wear her knee pads. Jenny fell and scraped her knees very badly. When she came home her mother scolder her for not wearing knee pads. Jenny decided never to skate without knee pads again.

The Genius Was The Intern. Charles was hired as an intern for a new clothing line. His job was in the marketing department. His first assignment was to increase sales of their urban clothes. Charles had an idea and then he contacted Will Smith, a friend. Will wore the clothes in a festival and sales spiked!

Sparky's Fish and Chips. Sparky loved fish and chips. One day his grandma took him to the grocery store. They bought fish and batter. That night both Sparky and his grandma cooked. They both had a nice dinner of fish and chips.

Snitch. Billy and jean were playing in the classroom. They stole the teachers eraser and started to throw it around. Elena didn't approve of what they were doing and told the teacher. The teacher told them to stop and gave them detentions. Elena felt nervous since she was the old who told the teacher.
Radio. Mikey was listening to a crystal radio. He started picking up a weird transmission. It had too much static to hear. He went to the top of a mountain. He heard a weather report on his radio.

Teacher, Teacher. Billy was in kindergarten. He was just getting used to using the toilet. He got nervous because he had to use the bathroom while in class. He raised his hand to ask the teacher to go. She let him go.

A piece of italy. There was a family that loved vacationing. They traveled all over the world. Their favorite country to visit was Italy. They decided to stay there for a month. However, they eventually needed to move back home.

Personal space. We went on vacation and my nephew had issues with personal space. We tried to talk to him about giving people some air. It was very sweet that he always wanted to hug us. But sometimes it was a bit too much. We finally had a good talk and he cut down on the hugging.

Wild Concert. Steph was excited to be at a wild concert. But she struggled to see the band. Someone threw mud at her face. But a man helped wipe it off and put Steph on his shoulders. Steph felt safer and was able to see her favorite band members.

New Business. Lincoln wanted to open a new catering hall. He looked at three different buildings. There was an old antique store for sale. He put an offer in on the building. The seller accepted his offer.

Spaghetti. Jules wanted to cook for her family. She decided to cook spaghetti. She bought all the ingredients. When she got home, she had forgotten the seasoning. Jules had to get creative but it all turned out great.

The Railing. The family lived on the second level. The stairs had a wobbly railing attached to them. The family begged their landlord to replace it. He always refused. The parents warned the kids about how unsafe it was.

Boredom. Deanna was very bored. She decided to ask some friends to spend some time with her. All of her friends were busy. Deanna decided to go to an activity by herself. She went to the movies alone and no longer felt bored.

The Shot. Brad went golfing last week. Brad was golfing well and having his best round. Brad hit a hole in one on an amazing shot. There was no one there to see Brad's shot. No one believed Brad when he told everyone of his shot.

Speak. Aya was studying Japanese. She excelled in her class. But she thought the best way to learn more was to visit Japan. She signed up to be an exchange student in Tokyo. There, Aya learned lots and lots more Japanese!

Art To Food. Barry was a very poor man with an talent for painting. He didn't sell his works for very much profit because he was ignorant. Barry wound up living in an alley and using old scraps for his art. He wound up creating his very own masterpiece in the alley. A wealthy passerby saw the man's work and bought it for a large sum.

The Planets. Dan liked to study science. He learned everything he could about the planets. He put the information on a poster. He took the poster to school to show his teacher. She was proud of the work Daniel had done.
Lost Cause. Tim's parents adopted a kid. He was a bit older. Tim and the other kid never got along. He would get into a lot of trouble. Tim's parents eventually gave up on him.

Wrong Guilt. I was playing basketball with a friend. I threw the ball to her since she was open. She immediately shot the ball. It ended up as an air ball. However, she blamed me for not passing it to her faster.

Jim Opens A Taco Truck. Jim wanted to open up a taco truck. He bought a used truck off of craigslist. Jim refurbished the truck to fit a kitchen. He started selling tacos on the street. Jim's business became successful and he became rich.

One Flew Over The Woman's Head. Sam and Nancy had been married for many years. The union was one of turmoil and conflict. Nancy's severe mental issues had become apparent early on. Sam had tolerated them as best as he could. Finally, he reached for a hammer, intending to deliver his solution.

Sparky's Homework. Sparky is a third grader. One day he came home with a scarecrow to cut out and color. The whole family got involved cutting and coloring. Sparky took it back to school to turn it in. The teacher gave him an A.
Soaked. It was raining in Carissa's area. She hurried into the house. Carissa had forgotten to put up the windows in her car. Carissa ran to put her windows up. Carissa was soaked.

Finding God. Herald went to the river to go swimming one day. He jumped into the water but was overwhelmed by the water. The river quickly became too strong and pulled Herald away. Just as Herald prayed for his life, he saw a hanging tree branch. Herald pulled himself out of the water and thanked God.

The nerd. The nerd woke up every morning excited for school. The nerd always made sure to arrive to his classes on time. Every class the nerd was made fun of for trying to hard in school. The nerd reported the bullies to the principal. The principal gave the bullies detention and the nerd was happy.

voting. Jay wanted to vote. He filled out the registration in high school. The registration got destroyed in the mail for some reason. Jay felt down about it and decided not to register. That is, until he got older and did it again.

Dad saves Son. The family was at granddad's rural cabin. Granddad said his rifle was not loaded and gave it to Jim. Jim aimed at his younger brother's head. Dad grabbed the gun and said never point a gun at a person. Dad aimed out a window into a hill and the gun fired.

The Pens. Lisa loved to make lists. She had many colored pens for them. She liked to write things in different colors. When her list was done, she got to work on the tasks. She liked to check each thing off.

A Helper. The old woman had trouble doing her grocery shopping. Trevor decided to assist the woman. He walked around the store and helped the woman. The woman was grateful for his help. The woman gave Trevor five dollars for his help.

Gary. Gary played professional baseball. He has played baseball since he was a child. He wished he could settle down and do something other than baseball. He finally met a woman and got married. Gary wants to retire and take his wife around the world now.

Pizza. Jamie really wanted to get a frozen pizza. She wasn't sure what to do though since she didn't have a pan. Remembering something she read she realized she didn't need one. Jamie instead used her skillet to bake the pizza in the oven with. It came out delicious and perfect.

Being Greedy. Janice was eating a sub with Brad. He asked her if he can take a bite out of the sandwich. He ripped the sandwich half apart and starting eating it. She ended up buying a second sandwich. In addition, she tried to keep it away from Brad.

Asked to be a bridesmaid. Beth was going to lunch with her sister. Her sister was recently engaged and planning her wedding. She handed Beth a little purple box. Inside was a necklace and a note. The note was asking Beth to be her bridesmaid and Beth said yes.

Birthday Cake. Brenda baked a cake for John's birthday. As she was bringing it to the table, she tripped and fell. The cake splattered all over the floor. Brenda was upset that she ruined John's birthday. John said he didn't like cake anyway.

Kilt King Ken. Ken's family descended from Scotland. He was very proud of this heritage. He had collected very fancy traditional cloths and artifacts. He entered a contest for best full kilt wardrobe. Ken won the competition for having the best and most kilts.

Staples. Cal got distracted by little things. One time he happened across a big box of staples. He started making a staple chain. He didn't stop until the chain was almost half a mile long. Cal needed to be stopped by his friends.

Lost Wallet. Sarah was looking forward to going shopping this afternoon. She got in her car and drove to her favorite shopping center. When she got to her favorite store, she could not find her wallet. She was panicked. She got in her car and was relieved to find her wallet had fallen out.

Audio recording. Jon's girlfriend loved books. Her birthday was coming up. He wanted to give her a great gift. So he made a recording of him reading a book he knew she wanted. He gave her the recording to hear the book in his voice.

Princess. I decided to dress up with my kids this year. I bought supplies to make a bloody princess costume. My husband is going to help me put it all together. He thinks I will look like Carrie. I can't wait until Halloween to scare everyone.

Kilt wearing dad. Abby loved her Irish heritage, and her Irish dad. Recently, Abby's dad invited her to the Irish parade with him. When Abby picked him up, Abby was shocked at his attire. Abby saw that her dad was wearing a black and red plaid kilt. Abby could not believe that her dad actually owned a kilt.

Diet. Sarah started a diet today. For breakfast, she ate a healthy and small meal. For lunch, she ate a healthy and small meal. After lunch she was starving so had a bunch of junk for dinner. Sarah figures that she will start a diet tomorrow.

Lost Shoe. I had a stroke and need special shoes. I was heading out today. I could not find my right shoe. I started to panic, until I found the shoe under a blanket. I vowed to keep my shoes together from now on.

First date. Kelly and Rob had a date for tonight. Rob picked her up at six. The two of them had a great time. The date went so well, they ended with a kiss. Rob and Kelly agreed to see each other again.
Heart. Ethan didn't know how to give his whole heart to a church. He really wanted to go all in. He decided to pray for direction. He prayed for help. He received an answer.
Going Overboard. Tim was on a cruise. He was drunk right away. He was playing around with others. Tim slipped and almost fell overboard. It made him decide to drink less.
Long time to dry. Allie painted her nails. She painted them a bright red. She had to wait for them to dry. She was getting rather irritated. Allie had to wait a half hour.

New Wallpaper. Alex liked the wallpaper in his living room. One day he noticed it had started to peel. He searched and searched for the same wallpaper to replace it. He couldn't find a match, so he decided to change all the walls. Alex ended up liking what he found and was content.

Jan goes to the dentist. One day a little girl named Jan was eating a candy bar. Half way through the candy she let out a scream. Jan was in serious pain. Jan's parents set up an appointment with the dentist. Jan goes to the dentist to get her tooth fixed.

Tennis Coming of Age. I always play my mom in Tennis at least once a month. I have been taking lessons and getting a lot better. My Mom use to play professionally and has been keeping up her skills. Last week it looked like I was going to beat her for the first time. She really played hard so I felt incredible when I won the final set.

Trumpet. Jude played the trumpet in his high school band. He wasn't very good. His parents said he couldn't quit because the trumpet was expensive. He quit anyways without telling his mom and dad. They eventually found out and were very angry!

Squirrel. One day, I heard a noise in my room. There was a squirrel in the walls! We put a trap in the attic with food and water and a bed. He finally went inside the little cage. When we brought him outside, the other squirrels started to chatter.

Richard Grows a Beard. Richard has always loved his clean shaven look. One day Richard notices more and more men growing beards. He decides not to shave for six months in order to grow a beard too. Richard receives compliments on his beard every day. Now Richard loves his new bearded look.

Silver Coins. May was walking down the beach. Suddenly a strange object got stuck in her toenail. She bent down and discovered it was a silver coin. She dug around the sand. She found many more silver coins, with no explanation!

Tea Time. When I got home from work tonight I made a mug of tea. I then sat down at my computer to do some research. One thing led to another and I had forgotten all about my tea. I only remembered when I knocked the mug over and ruined my keyboard. Now I put my tea on the table next to the computer.

The Phone. I went to the grocery store this morning. I used my cell phone to check the coupons in my account. When I got home, I couldn't find my cell phone. I called the store and someone had turned it in. I had to go back to the store, but was very glad to have my phone!

The Dog Park. Sam had a puppy. He tried taking it to the dog park. It was scared and other dogs barked at it. Same realized his puppy was too young for it. He went home and waited to return when it was older.

Tom's Diner. Tom used to a very jovial person. When the girl he wanted to meet stood him up that changed. Now he's much less gregarious. He still says he's looking for love. But we all think Tom's learned his lesson.

Felix Makes a Friend. Felix had always lived alone. He decided he wanted to make a new friend. Felix sat down next to a stranger at the coffee shop to say hello. The stranger replied. Now Felix has a friend.

Mylar Balloons. I love having heavy-duty helium balloons at parties. They look very festive. And if you get bored of them, you can inhale them for silly voices. The only problem is that they have to be kept tied down. I've lost no fewer than 10 balloons to the sky over the Year's.

Normal. Tim was sad that he wasn't normal. He was shorter than most boys. His hair was curly, unlike his classmates. He wore red while others wore green. Tim then realized that being different is what makes him special.

Fred Eats Salad. Fred always loved eating pork and beans. His doctor told him he needs to eat more vegetables. One day Fred forced himself to eat an entire salad. It was gross. The next day Fred was back to eating pork and beans.

Riding Lessons. Jane stepped atop the stool and tried to mount the tall horse. Her coach assisted her to gain her balance. Jane realized that she was quite a distance away from the ground. Starting to feel too nervous, she asked to dismount the horse. This is how Jane's first and last horse riding lesson ended.
The storm. Did you hear the horrible storm last night? I was driving home right in the middle of it. It was raining so heavy. The winds were so strong. I was happy to make it home.

The Powder Room. Jen's daughter was a toddler. Jen had left some expensive powder within reach in the bathroom. Jen walked into the bathroom and her daughter had made a mess with it. Jen cleaned up the powder in the bathroom. She put the powder where her daughter wouldn't reach it.

Lost Keys. Kim lost her house keys. She couldn't leave to work without them. It wasn't until she decided to do so anyway that she found them. They were still on the door lock. Kim felt dumb as she left to work.

Condo Values. My brother emailed me yesterday. An owner had an open house for his condo. It was offered at $500K. My brother was shocked, as he paid $90K for his unit in 1986. His wife is urging him to sell and move out.

Sled. When I was a little girl, I had a sled. One afternoon, I was sledding fast through snow. I didn't see the barbed wire fence at the bottom of the hill. As soon as I saw the fence, I ducked down. I saved my own life by acting quickly that afternoon.

Engagement. Josh and Liz had been dating for 4 months. He was already convinced he would marry her. He found the perfect ring and bought it. One night he took her to dinner. While out he proposed and she said yes.

Shots. Amy was in the dentist chair. He was preparing to do an emergency extraction. He walked towards her with a needle. She was afraid of needles, so she closed her eyes. She heard a popping sound as the needle broke the skin on her palate.

Poisonous Gift. Vanessa brought me a vase of plants. I thanked her and placed in the table. I had a bad case of allergies before going to bed. My daughter took me to the hospital during the night. The doctor found out that the flowers caused my allergies.
